column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday February 6 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Beaumont Centre Pkwy:
column4: All northbound lanes are shut down at Fieldstone Way due to an injury collision involving a vehicle on its side.

column3: Traffic Alert for Beaumont Centre Pkwy:
column4: Northbound traffic is being diverted to the Speedway lot toward Lakecrest Cir.
